content.p: If you are looking for a high impact, low cost intervention to develop your organisation, enhance a project or take a fresh look at your business processes, then the University of Nottinghamâ€™s award-winning programme could hold the answer. Postgraduate placements provide focused and cost-effective access to specialist expertise that supports the strategic growth of your organisation. We have a range of programmes to suit every type of organisations. Our postgraduates have made an impact on a variety of sectors, working on business critical projects, such as: We offer a seamless advertising and administration process, which includes recruitment and contracting, to allow you to focus on the supervision of the project itself. Placement students are on our payroll so there are no headcount or payroll requirements for the host organisation and our contracts cover Intellectual Property Rights (IPR), commercial confidentiality and Health and Safety.
